name: Fairmont Nile City
description: {'Information': ['Fairmont Nile City Hotel is located in the Nile City Towers on the Nile Corniche in Cairo and is considered one of the most luxurious hotels in the city. The hotel is distinguished by its modern design and strategic location, offering breathtaking views of the Nile River and the Giza Pyramids.'], 'Rooms and Suites': ['The photos showcase the 25-story hotel building, featuring 540 rooms and suites with an architectural design combining modernity and elegance.', 'The photos highlight spacious rooms equipped with the latest amenities, offering various views of the city and the Nile River.'], 'Dining and Facilities': ['The hotel provides a variety of restaurants serving international cuisines, as well as recreational facilities like the rooftop swimming pool, which offers a panoramic view of Cairo.'], 'Location and Access': ['The hotel boasts a location close to key attractions such as the Egyptian Museum and is approximately 25 kilometers from Cairo International Airport.']}
short_description: Fairmont Nile City: modern design, stunning views of the Nile, near important landmarks and upscale services.

name: Hyatt Regency Cairo West
description: {'Information': ['The Hyatt Regency Cairo West Hotel is located in the "Pyramids Heights Business Park" on the Cairo-Alexandria Desert Road, making it an ideal destination for both business and leisure travelers.', "Opened in 2021, the Hyatt Regency Cairo West combines Egypt's rich cultural heritage with modern services to provide guests with a unique stay experience."], 'Rooms and Suites': ['The hotel features 250 rooms and suites, ranging from deluxe rooms, spa rooms, and Regency executive suites to a presidential suite and royal suite. All rooms are inspired by Egyptian culture with modern touches, offering panoramic windows with views of the Giza Pyramids, the hotel gardens, or the city.'], 'Dining and Facilities': ['Park Food Hall: The main restaurant with 11 live cooking stations offering diverse European dishes.', 'Paranco: A unique fusion of Japanese and Peruvian cuisines.', 'The Market: A café offering a variety of grab-and-go meals and beverages around the clock.'], 'Location and Access': ['The hotel is about a 60-minute drive from Cairo International Airport and 20 minutes from Sphinx International Airport. Valet parking is available for an additional fee.']}
short_description: Hyatt Regency Cairo West Hotel: modern luxury with charming views of the Giza Pyramids and a strategic location.

name: Egyptian Opera House
description: {'Information about this activity.': ['The Egyptian Opera House is a must-visit place in Cairo, renowned worldwide, especially in the Middle East. Famous intellectuals and artists have been performing on its stage from ancient times to the present day.', 'Some of the most famous performances hosted at the Egyptian Opera House, and we invite you to attend one of these exquisite artistic shows:  Qalthomiyat concerts Ballet Modern theater dance Jazz concerts Spanish art music Italian orchestra concerts'], 'Location': ['The Egyptian Opera House is located in the Zamalek area on Gezira Island in Cairo.'], 'Contact': ['0227390188']}
short_description: The Cairo Opera House is a cultural center showcasing international arts and music in Cairo.

name: Cairo Tower
description: {'Information about this activity.': ["If you're looking to visit a tourist spot on the Nile in Cairo, Cairo Tower is your ideal destination! It is one of the most beautiful places to visit along the Nile in Cairo and a key Egyptian landmark, designed in the shape of the Egyptian lotus flower.", "In an amazing experience inside Cairo Tower, one of Egypt's prominent landmarks, you will need to ascend 16 floors reaching a height of 187 meters to enjoy one of the most beautiful panoramic views of Greater Cairo. The best time to visit Cairo Tower is at sunset. If you're there during that time, you'll witness the most magical scene ever.", "Cairo Tower consists of 16 floors, where you can enjoy viewing the entire city and engage in various activities such as:  Viewing through the magnifying telescope in the tower. Enjoy a delicious meal at the impressive circular restaurant with a stunning view of the entire city. Have refreshing drinks at one of the tower's cafeterias. Learn the meanings of your name in ancient Egyptian and enjoy many similar activities. Conclude your visit with a boat ride around Cairo Tower on the Nile."], 'Location': ['Cairo Tower is located on Zamalek Island Street along the Nile River, near Al-Andalus Park, Cairo.'], 'Working Hours': ["Cairo Tower's visiting hours start from 9 AM until 1 AM."], 'Contact': ['0227365112']}
short_description: Cairo Tower is a landmark offering panoramic views of Cairo with a unique experience and a revolving restaurant.

name: Museum of Civilizations (NMEC)
description: {'Information about this activity.': ['The National Museum of Egyptian Civilization, or the Museum of Civilizations, is undoubtedly one of the most exciting archaeological sites in Egypt to visit and uncover the secrets of the ancient Pharaonic civilization.', 'At the National Museum of Egyptian Civilization (NMEC), you are invited to explore Egyptian heritage with a new approach, showcasing mummies in the latest style. This unique museum provides a comprehensive glimpse into the historical periods that shaped Egypt, from the Pre-Dynastic era to modern times and the contemporary state.', "The Museum of Civilization is one of the most important archaeological landmarks in Egypt today, hosting various cultural activities and events, such as:  Attend events in the Celebration Hall and cinema. Enjoy special performances and concerts at the Roman Theater. Visit the restoration center and laboratories within the museum. Don't hesitate to buy unique souvenirs as a lasting memory. It’s easy to find parking space in the designated area next to the museum."], 'Location': ['The Museum of Civilization is located in the New Fustat City, by the Ain El-Sira Lake, in the Old Cairo district, Cairo.'], 'Working Hours': ['Daily from 9 AM to 5 PM.']}
short_description: The Museum of Civilizations displays the history of Egypt from ancient times until the modern era with various cultural activities.

name: The Pyramids of Giza and the Great Sphinx
description: {'Information about this activity.': ["The Sphinx and the Pyramids, undoubtedly, offer the best start to your tour of Cairo's top tourist attractions, where you can experience Egyptian civilization at its grandest, amidst notable development of various service centers around the archaeological area!", "There are many activities you can enjoy in this stunning area, which is one of Egypt's top tourist destinations, not just in Cairo. For example:  Watching the pyramids at night with unmissable night celebrations Unique views of one of the Seven Wonders of the World Visiting the Great Sphinx Capturing photographs of these ancient archaeological sites Shopping for artifacts and small statues shaped like pyramids and the Sphinx Riding camels and horses in an exciting tour around the pyramids, offering breathtaking views from all angles The “Sound and Light” show that brings the secrets of ancient Egyptian civilization to life in a one-hour performance."], 'Location': ['The three pyramids and the Sphinx are located on the Giza Plateau in the Pyramid area.'], 'Working Hours': ['You can enter the three pyramids at any time between 7 AM and 5 PM.']}
short_description: The Pyramids and Sphinx in Giza, among the ancient wonders of the world, are unique exhibits and an amazing tourist experience.

name: Luxor flying balloon and hot air balloons
description: {'Information about this activity.': ['Luxor is the only governorate in Egypt that organizes hot air balloon rides, competing with European countries and ranking fourth globally.', "Hot air balloon riders soaring above the skies of Luxor enjoy breathtaking views of the city's natural beauty, including the Nile River and ancient temples along its banks. The journey begins from the West Bank, rich with hundreds of Pharaonic tombs, reaching an altitude of 2,000 feet and lasting between 45 to 60 minutes.", 'In Luxor Governorate, there are over 14 companies specialized in hot air balloon rides, and you can contact any of them to book a flight. Each tour includes several activities, such as:  Riding riverboats to reach the balloon airport. Enjoying breakfast provided by the airline. Watching the balloon inflation process. Viewing various historical landmarks and natural features.'], 'Location': ['In front of Queen Hatshepsut Temple, West Bank area, Luxor Governorate.'], 'Working Hours': ['Hot air balloon rides start from 5 AM and continue until after sunset.']}
short_description: The adventure of flying over a third of the world's monuments.

name: Mummification Museum
description: {'Information about this activity.': ['The Mummification Museum is one of the most prominent tourist attractions in Luxor. It highlights one of the most significant practices of the ancient Egyptians, the process of mummification, whose precise techniques remain a mystery to scientists to this day.', 'The Mummification Museum showcases all the tools historically used in the mummification process, along with displaying mummies of animals and high priests of the god Amun-Ra. The museum is divided into several sections: Exhibition Hall, Lecture Hall, Documentary Films Hall, Cafeteria Hall'], 'Location': ['Corniche El Nile Street, north of Luxor Temple.'], 'Working Hours': ['The visiting hours for the Mummification Museum are divided into two daily sessions:', 'First: From 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM', 'Second: From 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM']}
short_description: The Mummification Museum in Luxor displays tools and mummies that highlight the secrets of ancient Egyptian mummification rituals.

name: Deir el-Bahri Temple
description: {'Information about this activity': ['The Mortuary Temple of Deir el-Bahari holds many fascinating stories. Visitors can discover them while exploring its temples and Pharaonic tombs carved into the rocks, which house 40 ancient mummies.', "Queen Hatshepsut built this temple to perform religious rituals and display the history of her powerful kingdom on its walls and carvings. The Mortuary Temple of Deir el-Bahari is divided into three temples, each belonging to a Pharaoh: Temple of Hatshepsut: Composed of three tiers with prominent rocky curves, featuring stone columns, statues of the god Osiris, and Queen Hatshepsut herself. Temple of Thutmose III: Located at the center of Deir el-Bahari, it includes a grand hall with 80 columns adorned with papyrus flowers and the sacred boat of Amun-Ra, one of the most revered ancient Egyptian gods. Temple of Mentuhotep II: Positioned on the Nile's bank before ancient Thebes, this funerary temple serves as a monumental tomb honoring the king's status among the realms of the dead."], 'Location': ['Behind the Valley of the Kings, near the Al-Wahat Al-Kharga district.'], 'Working Hours': ['Entry to the Mortuary Temple of Hatshepsut is allowed from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.']}
short_description: A magnificent Pharaonic temple in Luxor with delicate carvings, tombs and majestic architecture.

name: Luxor Museum
description: {'History': ['The Luxor Museum itself is a testament to Egyptian history, having opened in 1975. It currently houses nearly 400 archaeological pieces.'], 'Location': ['The Luxor Temple is located on Corniche El Nile Street, in the heart of Luxor Governorate.'], 'Visiting Hours': ['The Luxor Museum is open to visitors daily in two sessions:', 'The first session: from 9 AM to 4 PM', 'The second session: from 5 PM to 10 PM'], 'Tour Experience': ['From the moment you enter, the tour at the Luxor Museum begins by passing through the glass gates.', "The museum's halls are designed to offer panoramic displays, with dim lighting to highlight the prominent Pharaonic artifacts on display."], 'Artifacts': ['The Karnak Stele', 'The alabaster statue of the god Sobek', 'Statues of King Akhenaten', 'Engraved Thutmose Stones', 'Statue of King Amenhotep III', 'The war chariot of King Tutankhamun', 'The statue of Thutmose III made from schist', 'The limestone stele of King Kamose', 'The royal mummies of Ahmose I and Ramses I']}
short_description: Luxor Museum displays Pharaonic artifacts including statues, mummies and historical treasures.

name: Karnak Temple (Temple of Amun)
description: {'location': ['The Karnak Temple is located on Sheikh Moussa Street, Nile Corniche, in the East Bank area of Luxor Governorate.'], 'timing': ['The Karnak Temple is open for visits from 6 AM to 5:30 PM.'], 'popularity': ['The Karnak Temple is immensely popular among the residents of Luxor and foreign tourists.'], 'significance': ['It is a religious complex that includes a collection of the most prominent temples from various ancient Pharaonic dynasties.'], 'highlights': ['Some of the most important temples within the Karnak complex include:', 'The Hypostyle Hall: A massive hall designed with approximately 134 massive columns, adorned with hieroglyphic inscriptions and events from the ancient ruling dynasties of Egypt.', 'The Avenue of Sphinxes: This pathway has transformed into a global platform offering cultural sound and light shows using advanced technology, alongside Nile boat shows and dance performances.', 'The Sacred Lake: Located outside the main hall, the lake was excavated during the reign of King Thutmose III. It is one of the wonders of the ancient world, having existed for over 3000 years without any change in its water level.']}
short_description: Karnak Temple in Luxor is a religious complex that includes massive Pharaonic temples and a famous historical site.

name: Medinet Habu
description: {'location': ['Medinet Habu, known as the "House of Millions of Years," is located in the ancient city of Thebes.'], 'significance': ['It is a religious city built by King Ramses III for religious purposes, covering a vast area of 10 acres.', 'The massive walls of the city, measuring 18 meters in height, are among its most striking landmarks.'], 'highlights': ['Medinet Habu includes numerous religious temples, artifacts, and Pharaonic landmarks, such as:', 'The Temple of Ramses III', 'The Holy of Holies', 'The three Hypostyle Halls'], 'timing': ['Visits to Medinet Habu are allowed from 6 AM to 5 PM.'], 'entry_fee': ['The temple entry fee is 10 EGP for Egyptians and 140 EGP for foreigners.']}
short_description: Medinet Habu in ancient Thebes includes the temples of Ramesses III and amazing Pharaonic monuments with their huge walls and unique inscriptions.

name: Valley of the Queens
description: {'location': ['The Valley of the Queens is located behind the Valley of the Kings and is one of the most important temples on the West Bank of Luxor.'], 'significance': ['It complements the royal family’s legacy by including tombs of prominent royal women and noble classes.', 'This valley contains nearly 90 tombs, decorated with beautiful hieroglyphic carvings and inscriptions.'], 'timing': ['The Valley of the Queens is open for visits from 6 AM to 5 PM.']}
short_description: The Valley of the Queens in Luxor contains the tombs of queens and nobles from the Pharaonic family and is distinguished by hieroglyphic inscriptions.

name: Valley of the Kings
description: {'location': ['On a paved rocky path, visitors can reach the Valley of the Kings in Luxor, located on the west bank of the Nile River.', 'The Valley of the Kings Road is located near the El Wadi El Khariga District, in the West Bank area.'], 'attractions': ['Visitors can view over a hundred tombs of the Pharaonic dynasties.', 'They can also climb the slopes of the valley, watch the sunset from the top, and take memorable photos.'], 'significance': ['The Valley of the Kings is classified as a UNESCO World Heritage site.', 'It is known as the "Royal Necropolis" due to its inclusion of many tombs of Pharaonic kings, such as the tomb of King Tutankhamun, and the tombs of Kings Thutmose III and IV, Ramses I, II, IV, and VI.'], 'timing': ['Visits to the Valley of the Kings are allowed from 9 AM to 5 PM.']}
short_description: The Valley of the Kings in Luxor contains the tombs of the Pharaonic kings and is a world heritage site.

name: Cleo Park
description: {'General Info': ['Kleo Park is one of the largest, most famous, and beautiful amusement parks in Sharm El-Sheikh, offering a wide range of entertainment activities suitable for both adults, children, and families. The water park is designed in the Pharaonic style and features a variety of water games in different sizes and shapes to cater to thrill-seekers of all ages. Kleo Park is unique for having a designated area for children’s play and another area for adult games, ensuring everyone enjoys their fair share of fun in one location.'], 'Location': ["Kleo Park is located on Sharm El-Sheikh's Peace Road in South Sinai Governorate, approximately 11.1 km from Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport and about 2.9 km from Naama Bay."], 'Water Games': ["If you're a fan of water games, Kleo Park is the perfect place for you, as all the rides are filled with excitement and thrills. You can enjoy thrilling water rides in the park, such as Queen’s Trophy, the Scary Snake, the Last Temple, Scorpio Attack, and the Lost Pyramid. You can also cross Cleopatra’s Path filled with crashing waves, embark on a Nile River adventure, and ride the Aqua Loop slide and the Tsunami slide. For relaxation, you can take a lazy Nile Springs ride and enjoy time with your kids in the various swimming pools. The park also offers massage centers."], 'Additional Info': ['The park also offers a puppet show for children, and they can also get face painting. There are also a variety of restaurants and cafes to enjoy meals. As for working hours, the park is open daily from 10 AM to 5 PM, with entrance fees starting at 200 Egyptian pounds.']}
short_description: Cleo Park in Sharm El Sheikh is a fun water park suitable for all ages with exciting water rides.

name: Sharm El Sheikh Museum
description: {'General Info': ['The Sharm El-Sheikh Museum is the first museum dedicated to Egyptian antiquities in the coastal city of Sharm El-Sheikh. It serves as a significant addition to tourism in the beach city, allowing visitors to explore ancient Egyptian civilization alongside enjoying the stunning beaches and various marine activities.', 'The idea of building the Sharm El-Sheikh Museum dates back to 2006, and its construction was completed in 2017. The museum reflects ancient Egyptian life across different eras, particularly during the Pharaonic period, by showcasing artifacts that depict the daily lives of the ancient Egyptians.', 'The Sharm El-Sheikh Museum is located near the Sharm El-Sheikh district in the Hadaba area, about 10.7 km from Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport and approximately 9.9 km from the Naama Bay area.'], 'Exhibition Halls': ['The museum features three exhibition halls, nine galleries, and a conference hall, as well as an entertainment area with several restaurants, bazaars, and traditional craft shops, an open-air theater, and spaces for celebrations and events.', 'The museum also houses artifacts dating back to pre-Christian times and ancient Pharaonic periods. There is a section dedicated to displaying ancient Pharaonic jewelry and clothing, as well as an area for handmade crafts like pottery.', 'Additionally, the museum has a dedicated accessible tour path for visitors with special needs.'], 'Main Hall': ['The main hall of the Sharm El-Sheikh Museum showcases exhibits that tell the story of ancient Egyptian life, the wildlife they lived among, and their interest in sports, science, crafts, and love for animals, even to the extent of worshiping them.', 'It also highlights family life in ancient Egypt. The hall displays images of how animals and humans were mummified.', 'Additionally, the museum includes the Hathor corridor, which features numerous pieces dedicated to the goddess Hathor, as well as statues of kings such as Thutmose I, Hatshepsut, Nectanebo, Ramses II, and Ramses III.'], 'Famous Artifacts': ["The inner and outer sarcophagi of Istemhab, the wife of Pinedjem II, the high priest of Amun, and bearer of the titles 'Priestess of the goddess Isis and the deities Min and Horus of Akhmim,' as well as the statue of Queen Hatshepsut's head, are among the most famous artifacts displayed in the museum."], 'Opening Hours & Ticket': ['The museum operates every day of the week with two sessions: a morning session from 10 AM to 1 PM, and an evening session from 5 PM to 11 PM. The entrance ticket costs approximately 200 Egyptian pounds.']}
short_description: Sharm El Sheikh Museum displays antiquities of ancient Egypt and contains various halls and entertainment facilities.

name: King Tut Museum
description: {'Information about this activity': ['The King Tut Museum is one of the most important tourist attractions in Sharm El-Sheikh, beloved by visitors eager to explore ancient Egyptian culture and Pharaonic civilization. The museum houses 135 artifacts from King Tutankhamun’s tomb, discovered in 1922, along with photos documenting its opening. It narrates the treasures and mysteries of the tomb, the life of the young king, and how he met his untimely death.', 'The King Tut Museum is one of the most important tourist attractions in Sharm El-Sheikh, beloved by visitors eager to explore ancient Egyptian culture and Pharaonic civilization. The museum houses 135 artifacts from King Tutankhamun’s tomb, discovered in 1922, along with photos documenting its opening. It narrates the treasures and mysteries of the tomb, the life of the young king, and how he met his untimely death.', 'The King Tut Museum is located in Genena City, Naama Bay, approximately 12 km from Sharm El-Sheikh International Airport and about 2.4 km from Naama Bay.', "You can explore the museum's exhibits, which are distributed across various sections, each dedicated to a specific historical era and featuring artifacts from prehistoric and ancient times. There is a section focused on military history, showcasing a collection of ancient weapons, as well as an area displaying traditional Pharaonic clothing. Additionally, a section is dedicated to handmade artifacts, such as pottery that ancient Egyptians used to place in tombs for use in the afterlife. The museum also features a comprehensive section illustrating and displaying artifacts from the daily life of ancient Egyptians throughout the ages, starting from the Pharaonic era.", 'Adjacent to the museum, there is an open area featuring several restaurants and cafes where visitors can enjoy a variety of foods and refreshing hot and cold beverages.'], 'Contact Info': ['Mobile number: 01006865590 (+20)']}
short_description: King Tut Museum displays the treasures of the golden pharaoh Tutankhamun, and reveals the greatness of ancient Egyptian civilization.

name: Al-Sahaba Mosque
description: {'History': ['The foundation stone for the Mosque of the Companions was laid in 2011.', 'It was inaugurated in 2017, becoming one of the most famous religious tourist landmarks in Sharm El Sheikh.', 'The mosque is designed in unique Ottoman Islamic architectural style.'], 'Structure': ['The mosque covers an area of 3,000 square meters.', 'It has two minarets, each 76 meters tall.', 'The mosque can accommodate around 3,000 visitors and 800 worshippers.', 'It has 36 restrooms.'], 'Location': ['The mosque overlooks the sea in the Old East area, with a mountain behind it.', 'It is located about 18.6 km from Sharm El Sheikh Airport.', 'Approximately 8 km from Naama Bay.', 'There are no entrance fees to the mosque, making it suitable for families, children, groups, and organized tours.'], 'Cultural Importance': ['The mosque plays an important role in correcting misconceptions about Islam.', 'Two imams have been appointed, one fluent in English and the other in French.', 'The mosque organizes Friday sermons, weekly lessons, religious seminars, and Quran memorization classes in cooperation with the General Authority for Adult Education.'], 'Library and Resources': ['The mosque houses a large and extensive library containing many books in various languages about Islam and the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).', 'The library promotes tolerance and discourages violence.', 'Tourists frequently visit the library to learn about Islam and the Quran through reading books translated into different languages.'], 'Visitor Guidelines': ['Tour guides inform tourists about the necessity for women to cover their hair.', 'Tourists are reminded not to touch the Holy Quran without purity and ablution.', 'Tourists always respect the teachings of Islam.']}
short_description: Al-Sahaba Mosque features a wonderful architectural design and a religious-cultural library that attracts visitors from all over the world.

name: Cathedral of the Celestials
description: {'Information about this activity': ['The Heavenly Cathedral of the Coptic Orthodox Church is one of the famous tourist destinations in Sharm El Sheikh. It was inaugurated in 2010 in the presence of Pope Shenouda, though its foundation stone was laid in 2002. In the same year, it was ranked among the top 10 most beautiful churches in the world.', 'The church is distinguished by its stunning collection of engravings and paintings on its ceilings, as well as the artistic depictions adorning the stained-glass windows and woodwork, narrating biblical stories about the birth, life, and death of Jesus Christ, peace be upon him.', "Visitors and tourists are always amazed by the church's beauty, which closely resembles the Vatican Church. The cathedral also houses a large library with numerous manuscripts of the Holy Scriptures. Additionally, there is an attached buffet that serves meals to visitors."], 'Location': ["The Heavenly Cathedral is located on Al-Ma'ahad Al-Dini Street, in the Noor neighborhood, next to the Sharm El Sheikh Police Department, in South Sinai Governorate. It is approximately 15.3 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport and about 6.3 km from Naama Bay."], 'Historical Significance': ['The church tells the story of the miracles of Jesus Christ and significant Christian historical events that took place during His life and after His death, such as the Last Supper. Tourists are always amazed by the beauty of the church and the magnificence of the engravings and paintings inside.', 'Many tourists have praised the church, stating that its unique architectural design closely resembles the grandeur of the churches in the Vatican and Jerusalem.'], 'Visiting times': ["The church sees increased visits during Christian celebrations and Christmas holidays, such as Easter and New Year's Eve. The walls, ceilings, trees, and greenery are decorated to celebrate religious holidays. Many important figures in the country attend the Christian celebrations and holidays inside the church, and the church is fully secured by the security forces."]}
short_description: The Cathedral of the Celestials features wonderful artistic designs and tells important Christian stories.

name: Hollywood Sharm El Sheikh
description: {'Information about this activity': ['Hollywood Sharm El Sheikh is one of the most beautiful attractions in Sharm El Sheikh, beloved by many Arab and foreign tourists, especially families with children. The place is characterized by elegance, sophistication, and cleanliness, offering a variety of recreational activities suitable for all ages.', 'You can marvel at the replicas that depict ancient eras and view the life-sized dinosaur models crafted with the latest technology and incredible precision, making them appear lifelike, along with various animals.', 'Visitors can enjoy the music arena, where multilingual entertainment shows are performed, including English, Russian, and German. Additionally, you can watch magic shows and various dances.', 'The cinema halls are another highlight, presenting international films with 3D and 7D technology, providing an immersive experience and a sense of adventure during every scene.'], 'Location': ['Hollywood Sharm El Sheikh is located on Sheikh Zayed Street, next to the Sharm El Sheikh Police Department, approximately 9.9 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport and about 4.3 km from Naama Bay.'], 'Amusement Park': ['Hollywood Sharm El Sheikh also features an enjoyable amusement park centered around a large fountain that presents beautiful songs, with the fountain dancing gracefully to the rhythm of the melodious music.', 'In addition, there are various restaurants and cafes offering all types of food, refreshing cold drinks, and famous local desserts to suit all tastes.', 'The venue also includes shops and shopping centers where visitors can purchase clothing suitable for all tastes and ages, jewelry, souvenirs, papyrus, and small antique pieces.'], 'Visiting hours': ['The working hours at Hollywood Sharm El Sheikh are daily from 10:00 AM until 4:00 AM. The entrance ticket costs approximately 3 USD.', 'We highly recommend visiting this comprehensive entertainment destination to spend an enjoyable time with your family and friends.']}
short_description: An integrated entertainment destination in Sharm El Sheikh that includes shows, restaurants, shopping and activities suitable for all ages.

name: Entertainment center for children
description: {'Kids Entertainment Center in Tirana': ['Latitude Tirana is an all-inclusive entertainment center designed for children and families, located in Tirana, Albania. This venue offers a variety of fun and safe activities that enhance children’s motor and social skills, making it an ideal destination for a memorable time.'], 'Key Activities and Facilities:': ['Trampoline Zone: Safe trampolines for jumping and free play. Group games and competitions to encourage teamwork.', 'Climbing and Adventure Activities: Secure climbing walls suitable for all ages. Adventure zones filled with challenges to improve balance and focus.', 'Dedicated Play Area for Toddlers: Safe and age-appropriate toys for preschoolers. Brightly colored educational games to develop skills.', 'Additional Amenities: Parent lounge with comfortable seating and free Wi-Fi. A restaurant offering healthy snacks and meals for kids and families.'], 'Visitor Tips:': ['Advance booking is recommended during weekends to ensure availability.', 'Wear comfortable clothing and sports shoes for participation.', 'Ensure children follow safety instructions for an enjoyable and secure experience.']}
short_description: A comprehensive entertainment center specially designed for children and families

name: Water sports experience
description: {'AquaPark Albania Blue Magic Water': ['For those seeking fun and excitement in Tirana, AquaPark Albania Blue Magic Water is the perfect destination. This water park offers a unique mix of adventure and relaxation, making it an ideal spot for a summer day out with family and friends.'], 'Highlights and Activities:': ['Exciting Water Slides: A wide variety of slides suitable for all ages. High-speed slides for thrill-seekers.', "Kids' Play Areas: Small pools designed for children with safe water games. Dedicated areas for group and family activities.", 'Multiple Swimming Pools: Relaxing pools with nearby lounging areas. Clean and well-maintained facilities with top safety standards.'], 'Additional Services:': ['Cafés and restaurants offering light meals and refreshing drinks.', 'Sunbathing areas with comfortable chairs and umbrellas.'], 'Visitor Tips:': ['Wear appropriate swimwear and bring sunscreen.', 'Book in advance, especially during summer holidays, to secure your spot.', 'Follow safety instructions for a fun and safe experience.']}
short_description: A fun and action-packed place in Tirana that makes it a perfect choice for a fun summer day.

name: Shooting games - Paintball Club
description: {'Paintball Club Albania': ['Paintball Club Albania is the perfect spot for thrill-seekers and team players in Tirana. Offering a unique and engaging paintball experience, it’s a great destination for friends, families, and large groups.'], 'Features and Activities:': ['Exciting Paintball Games:  Various challenging scenarios like castle defense or organized attacks. A fully equipped and spacious area for a realistic and thrilling experience.', 'High-Quality Equipment: Modern paintball guns and complete safety gear are provided.', 'Suitable for All: Open to all ages above a certain limit (as per club regulations). Beginners and experts are welcomed with guidance from experienced trainers.', 'Group Activities: Perfect for special occasions like birthdays or corporate team-building events.'], 'Tips for Visitors:': ['Wear comfortable and washable clothes.', 'Book in advance to secure your spot.', 'Follow safety instructions for an enjoyable experience.']}
short_description: An ideal destination for thrill and adventure lovers in Tirana

name: Woodland Shukril Resort
description: {'Woodland Resort Shkrel': ['Woodland Resort Shkrel is a fantastic resort located in the Shkrel region of Kosovo, offering a perfect destination for nature lovers and mountain adventure enthusiasts. The resort is situated in the heart of the forest, providing visitors with a peaceful atmosphere and stunning natural views.', 'Location: The resort is located in the Shkrel area, known for its dense forests and surrounding mountains, offering the perfect environment for relaxation and outdoor activities.'], 'Facilities:': ['Fully equipped wooden cabins with modern amenities.', 'Hiking trails through the surrounding forests.', 'A restaurant serving both local and international cuisine.', 'Camping areas and mountain biking.', 'Free Wi-Fi service.'], 'Nearby Activities:': ['Hiking through the forests.', 'Mountain biking.', 'Visiting nearby attractions like Lake Pash.', 'Camping in nature.']}
short_description: An ideal destination for lovers of nature and mountain adventures.

name: Dolphina Park
description: {'Overview': ['Dolphina Park is one of the most famous amusement parks in Sharm El Sheikh, attracting a large number of tourists throughout the year. The park offers entertaining shows for adults, children, and families using dolphins trained to perform specific movements and play amusing water games with ease. The dolphins perform various tricks and interact with visitors. Children can also feed the dolphins under the supervision of specialized trainers.', 'Dolphina Park is located on the Al-Majlis Al-Baladi Street in Umm El-Sid Hill, about 11.1 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport and approximately 22 km from Naama Bay.'], 'Facilities': ['The park also has many fish tanks with colorful fish, rare marine creatures, small sharks, starfish, and various-sized colorful fish. It features several water games, including water slides of different sizes and lengths suitable for both adults and children, and a wave pool for a fun time with your family.', 'Dolphina Park also includes a large number of restaurants and cafes where you can enjoy various foods, cold refreshing drinks, and hot beverages like coffee, tea, and many more. There are also a variety of bazaars for purchasing souvenirs and Pharaonic antiques reflecting ancient Egyptian civilization.'], 'Ticket Price': ['The ticket price for the dolphin show is about 220 EGP for Egyptians, 110 EGP for children, 15 USD for adults from Arab countries, and 8 USD for children.'], 'Working Hours': ['Dolphina Park operates for one hour from 3:00 PM to 4:00 PM daily.'], 'Contact Info': ['Email: info@dolphina.net', 'Website: Dolphina.net', 'Phone: +2012 25001900']}
short_description: A family-friendly park offering an interactive experience with dolphins and sea animals in a natural environment.

name: Hotel Villa Adriatico
description: {'Villa Adriatiku': ["Villa Adriatiku is an ideal destination for those seeking relaxation and tranquility in the heart of Kosovo's stunning nature. The villa offers breathtaking views of the surrounding landscapes and boasts a warm and welcoming atmosphere. name: Mother Naile Bath
description: {'Location and Description:': ['Banja Nëna Naile Sulphur Springs are located in the region of Kosovo, believed to be near the city of Gjilan or other areas known for sulphur springs. These waters are known for their traditional healing properties, believed to be beneficial for treating certain skin conditions, joint diseases, and rheumatism. These areas are often surrounded by beautiful and peaceful nature.'], ' (Believed) Therapeutic Properties:': ['Sulphur waters in general are believed to contain minerals and sulphates that contribute to relieving some symptoms. Banja Nëna Naile waters are traditionally claimed to be used for treating:', 'Skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis.', 'Joint pain and rheumatism.', 'Some respiratory problems through inhalation.'], ' Traditional Usage:': ['Sulphur waters are usually used by bathing in them for specific periods, or by inhaling the steam rising from them. It is important to consult a doctor before using these waters for therapeutic purposes, especially if you have any health problems.'], 'Tourism and Visiting:': ['The Banja Nëna Naile area may be a simple tourist destination attracting visitors seeking natural healing and relaxation in nature. Some basic facilities may be available around the sulphur springs.']}
short_description: This water is known for its traditional healing properties

name: Ras Mohammed National Park
description: {'Overview': ['Ras Mohamed Reserve is one of the most beautiful nature reserves in the world and in Sharm El Sheikh, and one of the top ten places globally for diving.', 'You can say that Ras Mohamed is a paradise on earth, enchanting you with its breathtaking nature both underwater and on land.', 'Ras Mohamed Reserve is home to marine treasures such as rare fish, rare coral reefs, starfish, sea urchins, and wildlife treasures like foxes, reptiles, and migratory birds.', 'Some of the main landmarks of Ras Mohamed Reserve include the mangrove trees, the enchanted lake, the earthquake crack, Ras Mohamed Gate, the Ras Mohamed Panorama, and the observation tower.', 'The main beaches in Ras Mohamed Reserve are Marsa Brika, Al-Ghazlani, Al-Suwaysi, Yolanda, and Shark Observatory.'], 'Location': ['Ras Mohamed Reserve is located at the intersection of the Gulf of Suez and the Gulf of Aqaba in South Sinai, approximately 43.5 km from Sharm El Sheikh International Airport and about 35 km from Naama Bay.'], 'Activities': ['You can also enjoy a full-day boat trip in Ras Mohamed Reserve. The trip includes spending the day on a large two-deck yacht with diving gear such as fins and masks, along with an open buffet lunch.', 'The yacht departs early in the morning at 8:00 AM. Upon reaching the White Island, you can swim and take photos for an hour.', 'After the first stop, the yacht moves to two other locations for snorkeling with masks and fins, exploring the beauty of coral reefs and colorful fish.', 'The trip includes a buffet lunch after the second stop and drinks throughout the journey.', 'After the third stop, the yacht returns to the harbor around 4:00 PM.'], 'Diving': ["You can dive in the clear waters and swim with colorful fish and coral reefs, where you'll be able to see anemone fish, sea scorpions, and shark rocks.", 'You can also relax on the beaches of the reserve, enjoying its soft sands and captivating nature.', 'Many tourists also visit the reserve for healing in the sulfuric waters, which help reduce joint pain.']}
short_description: A famous national park known for its pristine coral reefs, crystal-clear waters, and diverse marine life, perfect for diving and snorkeling.

name: Vali Ranch

The ranch is an ideal place to spend quality time in nature and enjoy rural activities.'], 'Available Activities:': ['Vali Ranch offers a variety of activities suitable for all ages, including:', 'Horseback Riding: Horseback riding is one of the main activities at the ranch, where visitors can enjoy horseback riding tours in the surrounding areas.', 'Animal Interaction: The ranch provides an opportunity to get to know and feed various animals, such as sheep, goats, rabbits, and poultry.', 'Nature Walks and Hiking: Visitors can enjoy walking and hiking in the green areas surrounding the ranch and enjoy the beautiful natural scenery.', 'Enjoying Local Meals: The ranch often serves traditional Kosovar cuisine, using fresh ingredients from the farm.'], ' Accommodation (If Available):': ['Some Vali Ranches also offer accommodation options, either in traditional wooden cabins or in comfortably furnished rooms. It is advisable to check accommodation availability before visiting.'], 'Getting to the Ranch:': ["Access to the ranch depends on its specific location, but often requires the use of a private car or taxi. name: Mirusha Waterfalls & Canyons
description: {'1. Location and Description:': ['Mirusha Waterfalls and Canyons are located in the western part of Kosovo, near the town of Kline. This area is considered one of the most beautiful natural areas in Kosovo, characterized by a series of cascading waterfalls flowing into deep canyons, creating breathtaking landscapes. Mirusha Waterfalls are one of the most popular tourist destinations in Kosovo, attracting visitors with their natural beauty and diverse activities.'], '2. Formation of the Waterfalls and Canyons:': ['Mirusha Waterfalls and Canyons were formed by the Mirusha River, which carved its way through the limestone rocks over the ages, forming a series of 13 main waterfalls, in addition to many smaller waterfalls and natural pools.'], '3. Available Activities:': ['The Mirusha area offers many activities suitable for nature and adventure lovers, including:', 'Walking and Hiking: There are designated walking and hiking trails along the canyons and between the waterfalls, allowing visitors to enjoy the stunning natural scenery.', 'Photography: The area is a paradise for photographers, as the waterfalls, canyons, and dense vegetation offer great opportunities to capture stunning photographs.', 'Swimming in Natural Pools: Visitors can swim in some of the natural pools formed below the waterfalls.'], '4. Getting to Mirusha:': ['Mirusha Waterfalls and Canyons can be reached by car from Pristina or other cities in Kosovo. Public transport options such as buses to the town of Kline are also available, and from there you can hire a taxi to reach the site.']}
short_description: Waterfalls and canyons of Miroša in the western part of Kosovo, near the town of Klin

name: Gracanica Park and Lake

The lake is part of a small natural park offering a peaceful retreat away from the city bustle. Popular activities include:', 'Walking and Hiking: There are designated walking trails around the lake and in the surrounding park.', 'Picnics: The lake shores are a great place for picnics and enjoying a meal outdoors.', 'Fishing: Fishing is possible in the lake, subject to obtaining any necessary licenses.', 'Relaxing and Enjoying the Scenery: Visitors can relax on the lake shores and enjoy the tranquility and beautiful views.'], ' Getting to the Lake:': ['Gracanicko Lake is easily accessible by car from Pristina. Public transportation options such as buses and taxis are also available.'], 'Nearby Attractions:': ['The famous Gracanica Monastery, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located near the lake. A visit to the monastery is highly recommended to explore its rich history and distinctive architecture.']}

name: Bear Park
description: {' Location and Description:': ['The Pristina Bear Sanctuary is located just about 10 kilometers from the center of Pristina, the capital of Kosovo. Also known as the "Bear Sanctuary," it is home to a number of brown bears rescued from poor captive conditions, such as small cages in restaurants. The sanctuary provides a large natural environment for the bears, including forests, meadows, and ponds, allowing them to express their natural behavior.'], ' History of the Sanctuary:': ['The sanctuary was founded in 2010 by the international animal welfare organization "FOUR PAWS," after keeping bears in private places became illegal in Kosovo. Many bears that were kept in restaurants and other places were transferred to the sanctuary to provide them with a better life.'], ' Objectives of the Sanctuary:': ['The main objectives of the sanctuary are to provide a safe and natural haven for rescued bears, raise awareness about the importance of animal and wildlife protection, and promote responsible ecotourism.'], 'Visiting the Sanctuary:': ["Visiting the sanctuary is a unique experience, where visitors can observe the bears in their natural environment and interact with them in a safe and responsible way. You can also learn about the bears' stories and how they were rescued. It is advisable to check visiting hours before going."], 'Additional Information:': ['The sanctuary contributes to the conservation of biodiversity in Kosovo.', 'The sanctuary is a successful example of cooperation between international organizations and the local government for animal protection.']}
short_description: This place is home to a number of brown bears that were rescued from poor holding conditions

name: Gadim Cave
description: {'Location and Description:': ['Gadime Cave is located near the village of Lower Gadime, about 20 kilometers southwest of Pristina, the capital of Kosovo. It is also known as the "Marble Cave" or the "Double Entrance Cave" due to its two entrances. Gadime Cave is considered one of Kosovo\'s natural wonders, characterized by its stunning limestone formations, crystal stalactites and stalagmites, and small underground lakes.'], 'Discovery and Exploration:': ['The cave was discovered by chance in the 1960s during mineral exploration. A large part of the cave has been explored, with an estimated total length of about 1250 meters, while about 350 meters are open to visitors.'], ' Features and Formations:': ['The cave contains many beautiful natural features, such as the "Bat Hall," the "Blue Lake," and the "Cathedral Hall," which is characterized by its massive rock formations. The cave is also distinguished by the diversity of colors of rocks and minerals, making it a unique place.'], ' Tourism and Visiting:': ['Gadime Cave is a popular tourist destination in Kosovo, where visitors can take guided tours to explore the cave and learn about its history and formations. It is advisable to wear appropriate clothing and footwear, as the temperature inside the cave is relatively low and constant throughout the year (about 13 degrees Celsius).'], 'Additional Information:': ['Gadime Cave is considered an important geological site, helping scientists study the history of the earth and its formations.', 'The cave is surrounded by a beautiful natural area that allows visitors to enjoy walking and hiking outdoors.']}
short_description: Gadim Cave is considered one of the natural wonders of Kosovo, as it is distinguished by its magnificent limestone rock formations

name: Batlavsko Jezero
description: {' Location and Description:': ['Batlavsko Lake is located in northeastern Kosovo, near Podujevo (about 30 km northeast of Pristina). It is an artificial lake created in 1964 on the Batlavska River, surrounded by hills and forests, offering scenic views. The lake is used for drinking water and irrigation.'], 'Activities:': ['Water Activities: Swimming (in summer), boating (rental boats may be available), fishing (permits required).', 'Land Activities: Hiking, picnicking (designated areas available), camping (it is best to confirm camping availability beforehand).', 'Other Activities: Mountain biking.'], ' How to Get There:': ['By private car or taxi from Pristina or Podujevo (the road is mostly paved).', 'No direct public transport is available, but you can reach Podujevo by bus and then take a taxi.'], 'Best Time to Visit:': ['Summer (June-August) is best for swimming and outdoor activities. Spring and autumn are also suitable.'], 'Tips and Additional Information:': ['Wear appropriate clothing and footwear for walking, and bring sunscreen and a hat in summer.', 'It is recommended to bring your own food and drinks, as options near the lake are limited.', 'Limited accommodation options are available in Podujevo and nearby villages.', 'The area has historical significance, with some nearby archaeological sites.']}
short_description: It is an artificial lake created in 1964 on the Batlawska River, surrounded by hills and forests
